text: Abdul Hamid bin Ngah @ Zainal Abidin (February 20, 1944 â€“ December 30, 2014) was the former chairman of Majlis Amanah Rakyat (MARA) from July 16, 2004, to 2009. He was a Member of Parliament for Parit Buntar and served as a Minister in the Prime Minister's Department. Category:1944 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Malaysian politicians
title: Abdul Hamid Zainal Abidin
